OUTLINE : Patients receive condition regimen comprise fludarabine phosphate intravenously ( IV ) day -4 -2 rituximab IV day -3 , 10 , 24 , 38 . Patients undergo single fraction low-dose total-body irradiation ( TBI ) day 0 . After completion TBI , patient undergo allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( HSCT ) day 0 . Patients receive rituximab IV day 10 , 24 , 38 . Patients receive immunosuppressive regimen comprise cyclosporine orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) day -3 56 follow taper day 180 ( related recipient ) day -3 100 follow taper day 180 ( unrelated recipient ) . Patients also receive mycophenolate mofetil PO BID day 0-27 ( related recipient ) three time daily ( TID ) day 0-40 followed taper day 96 ( unrelated recipient ) . After completion study treatment , patient follow 6 month , 1 year , 18 month , 2 year , annually thereafter .
